summary: A Paris schoolgirl unwittingly ignites hellfire in the minds of men from Seine to Sorbonne.
cast: Daniel Gélin|Brigitte Bardot|Robert Hirsch|Jacques Dumesnil|Jacques Fervil|Jacques Jouanneau|Mauricet|Madeleine Barbulée|Yves-Marie Maurin|Anne Collette|Gabrielle Fontan|Luciana Paluzzi|Nadine Tallier|Darry Cowl|Andrès|Françoise Arnoul|Mischa Auer|Charles Bayard|Charles Bouillaud|Christian Brocard|Catherine Candida|Georges Chamarat|Michel Constantin|Jean Degrave|Lucien Desagneaux|Patrick Dewaere|Marc Eyraud|Madeleine Ganne|Henri Garcin|Pierre Leproux|Marcel Loche|Jean-Loup Philippe|Mac Ronay|Jean Rupert|Roger Vincent|Monique Vita|Jacqueline Warin
title: Deshojando la margarita
